creator: HeroCraft Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Sequel to the highly-rated Flash game Learn to Fly, played over 30 million times!

The penguin has awoken and seeks revenge on the wall of ice that he crushed in the previous game. At least this time, he has the foresight to use a penguin shaped sack as his test dummy!

Your goal is simple: fly as high, and far as possible. Flying rewards you with cash to spend on icy upgrades, and you can also gain additional cash by completing achievements on each level.

Lean 2 Fly features more obstacles, more enemies, more upgrades, more customization and more secrets, tricks, challenges and achievements than ever before to offer you a brand new gaming experience.

Our heroic Penguin is back for revenge! Will you help him crush this epic iceberg?

Features
• Simple yet addictive gameplay
• Control your slide to fly as far as possible
• Defeat flying mammoths and more
• Compete with your friends
• 60+ upgrades to discover to improve your flight
descriptionShort: Launch the penguin as high and far as possible, cracking new records!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-Interface improvements
-Minor fixes

title: Learn 2 Fly

creator: HeroCraft Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Learn 2 Fly is a sequel to the highly-rated Flash game Learn to Fly, played over 30 million times!
Now the game is available on mobile phones and tablets.

Our brave hero wants to prove that even birds, from the cold Antarctic, can fly. The penguin seeks revenge on the iceberg that he crushed in the previous game. At least this time, has the foresight to use!

In this game you have to learn to fly. You can use the sleigh, which you're going to accelerate on the icy ramp. Some fun and sometimes crazy devices for flight will help you get the height! Your goal is very simple: fly the island as high and far as possible. A sharp gust of winter wind can knock down a penguin. He also has to learn how to avoid dangerous birds and animals.

Flying gives you valuable cash to buy ice upgrades. Use a board chip with a motor? A sled with a rocket? Or a balloon and fireworks? It's up to you! The main thing is to fly as far as possible. Correctly selected the sledge and a powerful jetpack will help our hero to fly the whole island. After completing each level, you will receive gold coins that you can use to buy more powerful upgrades and gain new heights. Also, some coins will be given to you every day by loving penguin-parents.

The new version of this game features more obstacles, more enemies, more upgrades, more customization and more secrets, tricks, challenges and achievements than ever before to offer you a brand-new gaming experience. New enemies, dangerous animals and many secrets are waiting for you on the island.

The gameplay is quite simple, but you will have to be ingenious to get the maximum height. This game is perfect for adults and children. Enjoy colorful graphics and a fun game with our hero.

Our heroic Penguin is back for revenge! Will you help him to crush this epic iceberg?

Key features:

⛷ ️ Tap on the screen as quickly as possible to fly the farthest
🚀 Advanced flight physics
🦅 Destroy flying mammoths and angry birds
🤝 More fun competing with your friends
🛷 Upgrade your sled, rockets, and jetpack
🔧 More than 60 upgrades to improve your flight
🐧 Penguins
_____________________________________

FOLLOW US: @Herocraft
WATCH US: youtube.com/herocraft
LIKE US: facebook.com/herocraft.games
descriptionShort: Upgrade your jetpack to take new distance. Enjoy the flight over the iceberg!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We've been hard at work making Learn 2 Fly 🚀 better for you. For this version, we've made a bunch of bug fixes and performance enhancements 🛠 to make sure everything's running as smoothly as possible.
Enjoy flying with our penguin, and thanks for playing with us ❤️.

title: Learn 2 Fly

creator: HeroCraft Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
In 'Learn 2 Fly: winter games’ your goal is very simple: fly over the penguin isle as high and far as possible. You can use the upgrades for sleigh, which can help you to bounce and enjoy flying to the iceberg. Some fun and sometimes crazy devices for flight will help you get the height in long jump games! You also have to learn how to avoid hawk, arctic birds and animals in our winter game.

Our brave hero wants to prove that even birds, from the cold Arctic, can fly. The penguin seeks revenge on the iceberg that he crushed in the previous long jump games. At least this time, he has the foresight to use penguins shaped sack as his test dummy! How far can you go? Fly up!

Flying gives you valuable cash to buy icy upgradings. Use a flyboard and catapult? A glider with a rocket? Blimp or slingshot? The main thing is to bounce, make the farthest jump through the penguin isle. Correctly selecting the slingshot, blimp, glider, flyboard, catapult and jetpack jump will help our hero fly away over the island. You can use coins to buy more fun and powerful upgrading. Also, some coins will be given to you every day by loving penguins-parents. How far can you go? Let's start winter games!

The new version of this game features more enemies, more fun upgrading, the farthest distances and achievements than ever before to offer you a brand-new gaming experience in long jump games. New enemies, hawk, flying animals and many secrets are waiting for you on the penguin isle. Run and jump to fly away in our penguin games

The gameplay is quite simple, but you will have to be ingenious to fly away. Enjoy jetpack jump, colorful graphics, icy view and a fun game with our brave hero. Enjoy the fly in our penguin games!

Our brave Penguin is back for revenge! Will you help him to crush this epic iceberg? Join the club penguin and in or jetpack games.

Key features:

Tap on the screen as quickly as possible to fly up
Advanced flight physics
Destroy enemies - flying mammoths and arctic hawk
More fun competing with your friends in club penguin
Upgrade your jetpack, glider, catapult, blimp, flyboard or slingshot
More than 60 upgrades to improve your flight
Penguin games

How far can you go? Upgrade your jetpack jump and bounce in our flying jetpack games. Ice racer ready for a new flight over the island in our icy adventure. Let's start the flying games!

_____________________________________
To find more sequels to your favorite games:

FOLLOW US: @Herocraft
WATCH US: youtube.com/herocraft
LIKE US: facebook.com/herocraft.games
descriptionShort: Upgrade your jetpack to fly like a bird and take new distance! Penguin games

Enjoy flying with our penguin, and thanks for playing with us ❤️.

title: Learn 2 Fly

creator: HeroCraft Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
In Learn 2 Fly: flying games you have to learn how to fly over the penguin isle. You can use the upgrades for sleigh, which can help you to bounce and enjoy flying. Your goal is very simple: fly high over the penguin island as high and far as possible.

The penguin seeks revenge on the iceberg that he crushed in the previous game. At least this time, he has the foresight to use penguins shaped sack as his test dummy!

Learn 2 Fly: flying games is a sequel to the highly-rated Flash game Learn to Fly, played over 30 million times! Now this penguin game is available on mobile phones and tablets.

How far can you jump? Flying gives you valuable cash to buy ice upgrading. Use a glider with a motor? A catapult with a rocket? Or a balloon and fireworks? Fly high! The main thing is to bounce and fly as far as possible through the penguin isle. Correctly selected glider, catapult and a powerful jetpack will help our hero to fly the whole penguin isle. After completing each level, you will receive gold coins that you can use to buy more fun and powerful upgrading and gain new heights. Also, some coins will be given to you every day by loving penguins-parents.

The new version of this game features more obstacles, more enemies, more fun upgrading, more customization and more secrets, tricks, challenges and achievements than ever before to offer you a brand-new gaming experience. New enemies, dangerous flying animals and many secrets are waiting for you on the penguin isle.

The gameplay is quite simple, but you will have to be ingenious to get the maximum height. This penguin adventure is perfect for adults and children. Enjoy fly, colorful graphics, ice view and a fun game with our brave hero. Enjoy fly in our penguin games!

How far can you jump? Our brave Penguin is back for revenge! Will you help him to crush this epic iceberg? Join the club penguin and fly high!

Key features:

⛷ ️ Tap on the screen as quickly as possible to fly up
🚀 Advanced flight physics
🦅 Destroy flying mammoths and arctic birds
🤝 More fun competing with your friends
🛷 Upgrade your catapult, glider, and jetpack
🔧 More than 60 upgrades for the farthest flight
🐧 Penguin games

How far can you jump? Upgrade your jetpack and bounce to take a new distance. Ice racer ready for the farthest flights over the island in our flying games. Penguin games start now!

_____________________________________

WATCH US: youtube.com/herocraft
LIKE US: facebook.com/herocraft.games

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: Penguin Learn 2 Fly! Gliding Games & Flying Games

creator: HeroCraft Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
In Learn 2 Fly: flying games you have to learn how to fly over the penguin isle. You can use the upgrades for sleigh, which can help you to bounce and enjoy flying. Your goal is very simple: fly high over the penguin island as high and far as possible.

The penguin seeks revenge on the iceberg that he crushed in the previous game. At least this time, he has the foresight to use penguins shaped sack as his test dummy!

Learn 2 Fly: flying games is a sequel to the highly-rated Flash game Learn to Fly, played over 30 million times! Now this penguin game is available on mobile phones and tablets.

How far can you jump? Flying gives you valuable cash to buy ice upgrading. Use a glider with a motor? A catapult with a rocket? Or a balloon and fireworks? Fly high! The main thing is to bounce and fly as far as possible through the penguin isle. Correctly selected glider, catapult and a powerful jetpack will help our hero to fly the whole penguin isle. After completing each level, you will receive gold coins that you can use to buy more fun and powerful upgrading and gain new heights. Also, some coins will be given to you every day by loving penguins-parents.

The new version of this game features more obstacles, more enemies, more fun upgrading, more customization and more secrets, tricks, challenges and achievements than ever before to offer you a brand-new gaming experience. New enemies, dangerous flying animals and many secrets are waiting for you on the penguin isle.

The gameplay is quite simple, but you will have to be ingenious to get the maximum height. This penguin adventure is perfect for adults and children. Enjoy fly, colorful graphics, ice view and a fun game with our brave hero. Enjoy fly in our penguin games!

How far can you jump? Our brave Penguin is back for revenge! Will you help him to crush this epic iceberg? Join the club penguin and fly high!

Key features:

⛷ ️ Tap on the screen as quickly as possible to fly up
🚀 Advanced flight physics
🦅 Destroy flying mammoths and arctic birds
🤝 More fun competing with your friends
🛷 Upgrade your catapult, glider, and jetpack
🔧 More than 60 upgrades for the farthest flight
🐧 Penguin games

How far can you jump? Upgrade your jetpack and bounce to take a new distance. Ice racer ready for the farthest flights over the island in our flying games. Penguin games start now!

_____________________________________

FOLLOW US: @Herocraft
WATCH US: youtube.com/herocraft
LIKE US: facebook.com/herocraft.games

title:

creator: HeroCraft Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
In ‘Learn 2 Fly: flying arcade games’ you have to learn how to fly over the penguin isle. You can use the upgrades, which can help you to bounce and enjoy flying penguin arcade games. Your goal is very simple: fly over the penguin island as high and far as possible.

‘Learn 2 Fly: flying arcade games’ is a sequel to the highly-rated Flash game Learn to Fly, played over 30 million times! Now this penguin arcade game is available on mobile phones and tablets.

Flying gives you valuable cash to buy icy upgrades. Use a board chip with a motor? A sled with a rocket? It's up to you! The main thing is to bounce and fly as far as possible through the penguin isle. Correctly selected the sledge and jetpack will help our hero to fly like a bird through penguin isle. After completing each level in upgrade arcade games, you will receive gold coins that you can use to buy more fun and powerful upgrades.

The new version of this upgrade arcade game features more obstacles, enemies, customization and more secrets and achievements than ever before to offer you a brand-new upgrade arcade games experience. New enemies, dangerous flying animals and many secrets are waiting for you on the penguin isle.

This penguin adventure is perfect for adults and children. Enjoy colorful graphics, ice view and a fun upgrade game with our brave hero. Enjoy flying in our penguin arcade games!

Our brave Penguin is back for revenge! Will you help him to crush this epic iceberg? Join the club penguin and enjoy a funny upgrade arcade game.

⛷ Tap on the screen as quickly as possible to fly like a bird
